# Tekin Tercüme Website Project Instructions

This is a modern React + TypeScript website for Tekin Tercüme, a professional translation services company in Turkey.

## Project Structure
- Modern React components with TypeScript
- CSS modules for styling with blue gradient theme (#000066 to #0000CC)
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Multi-language support for translation services

## Design Guidelines
- Use CSS custom properties defined in index.css for consistent theming
- Follow the blue gradient color scheme throughout the site
- Implement smooth animations and hover effects
- Ensure accessibility with proper ARIA labels and keyboard navigation
- Mobile-first responsive design approach

## Component Architecture
- Functional components with React hooks
- TypeScript interfaces for props and state
- Modular CSS files for each component
- Reusable components for common UI elements

## Key Features
- Interactive quote request system with multi-step form
- Language selection dropdown menus
- Professional services showcase
- FAQ section with collapsible items
- Contact information and social media links
- File upload functionality for document translation

## Translation Services Content
The site supports multiple languages including Turkish, English, German, French, Italian, Russian, Arabic, Persian, Chinese, Japanese, Greek, Dutch, Bulgarian, Romanian, and Ukrainian.

## Coding Standards
- Use semantic HTML elements
- Implement proper TypeScript typing
- Follow React best practices and hooks patterns
- Use CSS Grid and Flexbox for layouts
- Optimize images and assets for web performance
